00041     std::cerr << "[ERROR] operator+(_zgbmatrix&, _zgematrix&)" << std::endl
00042               << "These two matrises can not make a summation." << std::endl
00043               << "Your input was (" << matA.M << "x" << matA.N << ") + ("
00044               << matB.M << "x" << matB.N << ")." << std::endl;
00045     exit(1);
00046   }
00047 #endif//CPPL_DEBUG
00048   
00049   for(long i=0; i<matA.M; i++){
00050     for(long j=max(0,i-matA.KL); j<min(matA.N,i+matA.KU+1); j++){
00051       matB(i,j) =matA(i,j)-matB(i,j);
00052     }
00053   }
00054   
00055   matA.destroy();
00056   return matB;
00057 }
